attributes.comment:
Dear Sir / Madam:
This is my personal openion:
Every applicant when called for Oath Ceremony, must submit a money order for
the amount of USD 100.00, at the time of Oath Ceremony, before taking the Oath.
I heard on CNN News that last year about 700,000 applicants were granted
Citizenship. By imposing this One Hundred Dollar Fee at the time of Oath
Ceremony before taking Oath, will generate an additional Yearly Revenue of
70,000,000.00 Dollars which could be utilized to improve the existing appliction
and processing services by allocating more Human / Technological / Electronic
etc. resources and reducing the backlog.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Nazim Islam
